TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PrincipalSearcher extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 封装用于对基础主体存储区执行查询的方法和搜索模式。

span.span: Encapsulates the methods and search patterns used to execute a query against the underlying principal store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用默认页大小为 256 KB 时类的域主体执行查询。The default page size of 256 KB is used when the class performs a query for domain principals. 应用程序可能会通过设置重写默认值属性中的基础从返回的对象方法。The application may override the default value by setting the property in the underlying object that is returned from the method.

span.span: Query by Example

span.span: The property must be set before the Principal searcher object can be used to perform a search.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Context As PrincipalContext

summary.span: 获取用于执行查询的主体上下文。

span.span: Gets that principal context that is used to perform the query.

summary.span: 上下文指定对其执行搜索操作的服务器或域。

span.span: The context specifies the server or domain against which search operations are performed.

value.span: 对象，用于指定要对其执行操作的服务器或域。

span.span: The object that specifies the server or domain against which operations are performed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从设置的主体对象的上下文属性获取此属性中包含的对象属性。The object contained in this property is obtained from the context property of the principal object set in the property. 使用指定的主体上下文对象中的凭据执行查询并在指定的容器属性。Queries are performed using the credentials specified in the principal context object and the container specified in the property. 有关和上下文类型，该容器是容器对象的可分辨名称 (DN)。For and context types, the container is the Distinguished Name (DN) of a container object.

span.span: Query by Example

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult`1<class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal> FindAll() cil managed
Public Function FindAll () As PrincipalSearchResult(Of Principal)

summary.span: 返回主体搜索结果，其中包含与查询筛选器属性中指定的主体相匹配的所有主体对象的集合。

span.span: Returns a principal search result that contains a collection of all the principal objects that match the principal specified in the query filter property.

returns.span: 一个与查询筛选器匹配的 对象，如果未找到结果，则为一个空集合。

span.span: A object that matches the query filter or an empty collection if no results are found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主体对象中返回主体搜索结果匹配项中包含的对象类型属性。The principal objects returned in the principal search result match the type of object contained in the property. 在指定的上下文中执行搜索属性。The search is conducted in the context specified in the property. 有关更多信息，请参见“示例查询”概述主题。For more information, see the Query by Example overview topic.

span.span: The contains referential properties.

exception.span: 有关更多信息，请参见“示例查询”概述主题。

span.span: For more information, see the Query by Example overview topic.
The is a persisted principal.

exception.span: 执行查询之前，必须先将 分配给主体搜索器。

span.span: A must first be assigned to the principal searcher before the query can be performed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal FindOne() cil managed

summary.span: 返回一个主体搜索结果，其中包含找到的与 属性指定的主体相匹配的第一个主体对象。

span.span: Returns a principal search result that contains the first principal object found that matches the principal specified in the property.

returns.span: 一个 对象，其中包含与查询筛选器相匹配的主体对象，如果未找到结果，则为 null。

span.span: A object that contains the principal object that matches the query filter or null if no results are found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是否有且只有一个匹配项中指定的对象的，此方法将返回该对象。If there is exactly one match of the object specified in the , this method returns that object. 如果有多个匹配项的对象，此方法将任意返回匹配的主体之一。If there are multiple matches of the object, this method arbitrarily returns one of the matching principals. 从此方法返回的对象与对象中包含的类型相匹配属性。The object returned from this method matches the type of object contained in the property. 在指定的上下文中执行搜索属性。The search is conducted in the context specified in the property. 有关详细信息，请参阅[按示例查询](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e) 概述主题。For more information, see the [Query by Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e) overview topic.

span.span: The contains referential properties.

exception.span: 有关详细信息，请参阅[按示例查询](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e) 概述主题。

span.span: For more information, see the [Query by Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e) overview topic.
The is a persisted principal.

exception.span: 执行查询之前，必须先将 分配给主体搜索器。

span.span: A must first be assigned to the principal searcher before the query can be performed.

System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement Namespace Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance object GetUnderlyingSearcher() cil managed

summary.span: 返回帐户管理 API 用以执行搜索的基础搜索对象。

span.span: Returns the underlying search object that is used by the Account Management API to perform the search.
A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序可以修改的属性是直接在执行查询前的对象。The application can modify the properties directly on the object before executing the query. 该查询然后将执行使用修改后的属性。The query will then execute using the modified properties. 例如，使用默认页大小为 256 KB 时类执行的查询主体。For example, the default page size of 256 KB is used when the class performs a query for principals. 应用程序可能会通过设置重写默认值属性中的基础从此方法返回的对象。The application may override the default value by setting the property in the underlying object that is returned from this method.

exception.span: 执行查询之前，必须先将 分配给主体搜索器。

span.span: A must first be assigned to the principal searcher before the query can be performed.
The contains referential properties.

exception.span: 有关详细信息，请参阅[按示例查询](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e) 概述主题。

span.span: For more information, see the [Query by Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e) overview topic.
The is a persisted principal.
Query by Example

System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement Namespace Overview

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::DirectoryServices::AccountManagement::Principal ^ QueryFilter { System::DirectoryServices::AccountManagement::Principal ^ get(); void set(System::DirectoryServices::AccountManagement::Principal ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于查找匹配主体的查询筛选器。

span.span: Gets or sets the query filter that is used to locate matching principals.

value.span: 查询使用的 对象；如果未设置筛选器，则为 null。

span.span: The object that is used for the query or null if no filter is set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性中包含的主体对象可以是任何类型的主体类派生的对象： 计算机、 用户或组。The principal object contained in this property can be any type of object derived from the principal class: computer, user, or group. 也可以通过扩展定义的扩展的主体类型， ，或。The can also be an extended principal type that is defined by extending either , , or . 传递给此属性的派生的类对象的类型确定查询的对象的类型。The type of the derived class object that is passed to this property determines the type of object that is queried. 生成的查询包含指定的主体对象上设置的所有属性的逻辑 AND。The resulting query contains a logical AND of all the properties set on the specified principal object. 有关详细信息，请参阅[按示例查询](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb384378) 概述主题。For more information, see the [Query by Example](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb384378) overview topic. 扩展类的详细信息，请参阅[主体扩展](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49d1b257-d652-4224-bdae-2edabced8f00)概述主题。For more information on the extended classes, see the [Principal Extensions](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49d1b257-d652-4224-bdae-2edabced8f00) overview topic.

exception.span: 持久化主体对象不能用作 。

span.span: Persisted Principal objects can not be used as the .

exception.span: 不能为 null 或为空。

span.span: The cannot be null or empty.
Query by Example
